participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and imaginative, Alex enjoys exploring new worlds through storytelling.
participant_1.background: I love role play. I read a lot. I visit comic con. I draw comics.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and driven, Jordan is passionate about academics and pop culture.
participant_2.background: I take pride in getting straight A's. My favorite rapper is Yo Gotti. I am addicted to the hit show Empire. God has always been put first in my life.

content.text: I'm such a nerd, I love role playing games and drawing comics. I also love to read.
I love role playing too! I'm part of an online D&D group.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to try D&D, but I've never had anyone to play with.
You should totally join us sometime! We're always looking for new players.
That would be so much fun! I'll have to look into it.
You should! We're a really fun group, and we're always looking for new ways to have fun.
I'm sure I'd fit right in. I'm really into reading and writing, so I think I'd be a good fit for your group.
I think you would too! We have a lot of people who are into those things.
That's great! I'm so excited to try D&D.
You won't regret it! It's a lot of fun.
